name: Devil's Casino
description:
Devil's Casino

Devil's Casino is a small arcade game which was made at the Fantoche Gamejam 2022 in only 3 days. This year's topic and restriction were "gambling" and "only use one button".

You're the devil and have to keep your customers addicted for as long as possible. Throw luck or misfortune at them, so that their luck-strike doesn't stop. But also, don't make them too happy either, otherwise they will cash out and you will go broke. The clue? You don't know either what will come up next. How long will your casino last?

Before we started working on our prototypes, we had the opportunity to visit a casino and to learn about how gambling games and the casino business work in general. We also got to know a person, that works with people suffering from gambling addiction. With all these impressions, four different teams with people from three different schools and each different specializations started to work on their own interpretation of what "gambling" is.

Our Team

Yasemin Koyuncu - Art (HSLU Animation)

Finn Meisner - Art & Animation (HSLU Animation)

Jan Klingner - Art Direction (Filmakademie BW, Interactive Media)

Leonhard Holzenburg - Coding (ZHdK Game Design)

Install Instructions

Unzip the folder, then run the .exe inside the folder that shipped with it.
